text:
convolutional layer and one max pooling layer.
# define model
model = Sequential()
model.add(Conv1D(filters=n_filters, kernel_size=n_kernel, activation=' relu' ,
input_shape=(n_input, n_features)))
model.add(MaxPooling1D(pool_size=2))
model.add(Flatten())
